1.9 Multikeygen Digital Insanity + Manual

Description:
----------------
Sony Vegas Pro 10 is composed of two powerful applications that work seamlessly together to provide an efficient and intuitive environment for professional video and television. This comprehensive suite offers the most robust and progressive platform for content creation and production. With broad format support, effects processing, a unique audio support, and a full complement of editing tools, collection of Vegas Pro 10 optimizes workflow. From acquisition to delivery, from camera to Blu-ray Disc ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢, the Vegas Pro 10 provides exactly what you need to produce outstanding results.

Precise Editing Tools

Edit SD or HD video with drag and drop, mouse and keyboard trimming, and ripple editing. Features include ProType Titling technology, multicamera editing tools, video processing 32 bits of floating, customizable window layouts, color-coded snapping, HDV / AVCHD / RED / SDI / XDCAM support, A / V synchronization detection and repair, and auto-frame quantization.

Professional 32 - and 64-workflow bits

The Vegas Pro 10 interface provides a fully customizable workspace for a wide range of production requirements. Dock multiple windows across multiple monitors, and save your layouts to fit specific editing tasks, nest Vegas projects within the timeline, customize and save keyboard commands, and use application scripting to automate repetitive tasks. Management of media throughout the system produces maximum efficiency.

Stereoscopic 3D Editing

Create 3D stereoscopic projects utilizing the same workflow we have established in 2D media!. Vegas Pro 10 provides the ability to import, adjust, modify, preview, and 3D stereoscopic production of media - all formats using industry standard process server including one or two files with the side to side, up / down, or AC line coding. Anaglyphs and output monitoring are also supported.

Superior Audio Control

Use unlimited tracks, 24-bit/192 kHz audio, punch-in recording, 5.1 surround mixing, effects automation, and time compress / expand. Apply customizable audio effects in real time, such as EQ, reverb, delay, and more. Expand your audio processing and mixing options with supported third-party DirectX Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® and VST audio plug-ins. Use the console for precise audio control.

Broad Format Support

Vegas Pro 10 software natively supports newer formats including XDCAM professional camcorder, NXCAM, AVCHD, and RED. Vegas Pro 10 software also includes support for still images in more than a gigapixel resolution. Use Pan and Scan to create a movie sequence of these amazing photos of great size while keeping the HD resolution.

Powerful Blu-ray Disc

Create your own Blu-ray discs. Burn Blu-ray Disc ÃƒÂ¢Ã¢â‚¬Å¾Ã‚Â¢ directly from the Vegas timeline Pro for high-definition delivery. Use the DVD Architect Pro software (included in the collection of Vegas Pro) to create a DVD or Blu-ray Disc with multiple video angles, subtitles, multiple languages, and special features. Preview and test your work in real time. Apply Brightness and Contrast, Auto Levels, Crop, and Anti-Flicker filters. Set CSS and Macrovision Ãƒâ€šÃ‚Â® copy protection flags for masters.
